positions.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
positions.description: Lead development of scalable web applications serving 100K+ users. Architect and implement microservices infrastructure, mentor junior developers, and drive technical decision-making for product roadmap.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through performance optimization
Led migration to microservices architecture, improving system reliability
Mentored 5 junior developers, with 3 receiving promotions
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%

positions.title: Full Stack Developer
positions.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to SaaS applications. Collaborated with design and product teams to deliver high-quality user experiences.
achievements: Implemented automated testing reducing bugs by 50%
Optimized database queries improving response times by 35%
Led frontend architecture decisions for 3 major projects

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description: Specialized in creating responsive, accessible web interfaces for diverse clients. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs and ensure optimal user experience across all devices.
achievements: Delivered 25+ responsive websites with 100% client satisfaction
Improved accessibility scores to AA compliance for all projects
Reduced development time by 30% through component library creation
Trained team on modern CSS techniques and best practices

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
